title: DriverEasy PRO 4.6.6.42258 PreActivated {(dabasHD)}
description:
DriverEasy PRO 4.6.6.42258 PreActivated


-------[Description]-----------------------------------
DriverEasy is a straightforward application that will help you detect and download your missing or outdated drivers. Are you still annoying with your driver issue? DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t be!

With the friendly user Interface, Driver Easy can save you so much time & energy to find the latest drivers for your computer.

Powered by its Industry-leading technology, 100,000 + hardware driver database, daily-updating drivers support, Driver Easy drives your computer faster and assures your system running more safe & steadily.

ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s easy to backup every driver installed in your pc and restore it whenever you want. Further more , If you encounter the old and new driver incompatible, DriverEasy can let you easily Uninstall any Drivers that you do not need . With a few seconds you can clear up your system and keep the specified driver working quite well.


-------[Features]--------------------------------------
Your One-Stop Driver Solution:
Ã‚Â· Driver Easy is design for quickly and easy to identify unknown device's drivers, and keep your driver in latest version. Much more, we have implement driver backup, driver restore, and driver uninstall feature, to ensure your driver secure and safe.

Detect Unknown Device Driver:
Ã‚Â· Driver Easy has a huge online database, which include over 100,000,000 hardware device's driver, with it revolutionary driver detect engine, it help you download the unknown device driver, help you fix the driver issue.

Keep Existing Driver Up-to-Date:
Ã‚Â· With our daily update driver database, your system will improve the performance, fix the blue screen problem, add more enhance feature by install the latest drivers.

Backup & Restore Drivers:
Ã‚Â· Do not worry about it if you lost the driver disc, Driver Easy can backup the driver your current installed, you can restore it after system reload. This is an benefit feature if you not sure are the new driver compatible your system or not, you can backup existing driver, and roll-back it later.

Uninstall Removed Hardware Driver:
Ã‚Â· When you replace the graphic card, do you know Windows still keep your old one driver, and will launch it each time, when Windows start up. This will case the system slowing boot up, and may case some system conflict. Driver Easy allow you uninstall the removed hardware, to clean up your system.



-------[Requirements]----------------------------------
OS: Windows 2K / XP / Vista / Vista64 / 7 / 7 x64 / 8 32-bit / 8 64-bit
Ã‚Â· Pentium III or higher
Ã‚Â· 128 MB of available RAM
Ã‚Â· 25 MB of free Hard Disk space
Ã‚Â· Internet Connection to Download Driver
Ã‚Â· .NET Framework 2.0


-------[What's New in This Release]--------------------
Ã‚Â· Fix an auto-update bug

HomePage - http://www.drivereasy.com
